main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 3-4 September 1966 by Tech. Controller J.F. Hallett, JR. and his wife.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light,Its shape was round and appeared the size of a basketball at arm's length,The speed of the object was extremely rapid and it disappeared suddenly,The observation was made under sufficient overcast conditions,The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: Tech. Controller J.F. Hallett, JR. and his wife
